name: Cursed Crystal
description:
Cursed crystal may be stabilazed only when all 3 rotating platforms are fills its by the same type of energy.

When crystal is stabilazed it's refilling appropriate ability resource.

Rotate platforms via stepping the button on its center. This also helps you to decrease enemies crowd. 

There are 4 abilities to help you stay alive longer:

- Attack

- Curing

- Invisibility

- Running

Good luck!

Controls:

LMB and mouse move to control avatar

Mouse wheel scroll to select abilities

RMB to use ability
